description.title: Information
p: This is the GTT's Crawler, an unofficial API to access information about the active public transport in Turin.

To query the API, invoke this endpoint:
https://gtt.racca.me/api.php?stop={your_stop_id}}
Where {your_stop_id} is the ID of a stop.
The full documentation can be found <a target='_blank' href='https://github.com/SebaOfficial/GttCrawler/'>here<a>
